GeDBIT.dist

类 ImageMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeDBIT.dist.ImageMetric
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Metric, java.io.Serializable

    public class ImageMetric
extends java.lang.Object
implements Metric
    Computes the distance between images. Designed for the GeDBIT image dataset, ImageMetric may not work for other datasets.
    版本:
    2005.10.31
    作者:
    Wenguo Liu, Rui Mao
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      Computes the distance between two objects.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance(IndexObject one,
                 IndexObject two)
        从接口复制的说明: Metric
        Computes the distance between two objects.
        指定者:
        getDistance 在接口中 Metric
        参数:
        one - the Object over which the keys are defined.
        two - the other Object over which the keys are defined.
        返回:
        the distance between the two objects

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance(Image one,
                 Image two)
        参数:
        one - the Image over which the keys are defined.
        two - the other Image over which the keys are defined.

      • getDistance_Fea

        public double getDistance_Fea(Image one,
                     Image two,
                     int FeaIndex)
        参数:
        one - the Image over which the keys are defined.
        two - the other Image over which the keys are defined.
        FeaIndex - the feature on which distance is to be computed.
